data: Provider to print age appropriate TBSA burn diagram from FormFast
Scan the TBSA burn diagram into a single document once the surgeon completes the preliminary estimation and then once the final estimation is complete
Apply Acticoat Single, Site: In clinically appropriate area(s), Change dressing two times a week, May reinforce dressing PRN
Apply Acticoat Double, Site: In clinically appropriate area(s), Change once a week, May reinforce dressing PRN
Apply Mepilex Ag, Site: In clinically appropriate area(s), Change  dressing two times a week, May reinforce dressing PRN
Apply Viscopaste, Site: In clinically appropriate area(s), Change dressing two times a week, May reinforce dressing PRN
Apply Viscopaste, Site: In clinically appropriate area(s), Change dressing once a week, May reinforce dressing PRN
Apply Silicone: Mepitel One, Site: In clinically appropriate area(s), Change dressing qdaily, May reinforce dressing PRN
Apply Other (please specify), Site: In clinically appropriate area(s), Moisturize healed areas, TID and PRN
Apply Other (please specify), Site: In clinically appropriate area(s), Change dressing qdaily, Apply single layer Tubigrip to healed areas
Apply Other (please specify), Site: In clinically appropriate area(s), Change dressing qdaily, Apply double layer Tubigrip to healed areas
Apply Polysporin, Site: Face/Ear(s), Apply TID and PRN to keep shiny
Apply Other (please specify) wash face/ ear(s) with soap and face cloth down to base layer once daily
Apply Polysporin/Silicone: Mepitel One, Site: Perineum/genitals, Apply at diaper changes/toileting and PRN to keep shiny
Apply Acticoat Single, Site: Perineum/genitals, Change daily and PRN when soiled
See link for Pediatric post-op body diagram to indicate new graft and donor areas
Scan the post op burn diagram
T+5;N, Leave graft dressing intact until post op day 5
Apply  Acticoat Single, Change dressing two times a week, May reinforce dressing PRN
Apply Acticoat Double, Change dressing once a week, May reinforce dressing PRN
Apply Viscopaste, Change dressing two times a week, May reinforce dressing PRN
Apply Mepilex Ag, Change dressing two times a week, May reinforce dressing PRN
Apply Silicone: Mepitel One, Change dressing qdaily May reinforce dressing PRN
Apply Other (please specifiy), Site: All donor sites, Leave donor site dressing intact until first post op dressing change or as directed by physician. Reinforce dressing PRN
Only starting on post op day _____
Only starting on post op day _____
1 application, topical, TID, order duration: 7 day, drug form: oint
1 application, topical, QID, order duration: 7 day, drug form: oint
1 application, topical, as directed, PRN other (see comment), drug form: oint
1 application, topical, as directed, PRN other (see comment), drug form: oint
1 application, topical, order duration: 7 day, as directed PRN, drug form: eye oint
1 application, topical, order duration 4 days, as directed PRN, drug form: eye oint
1 application, topical, as directed, PRN, drug form: eye oint
